forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun casts a bright, yet gentle warmth across the cityscape, blurring the edges of the vibrant urban landscape. The temperature hovers around 66 degrees, with a slight drop to 63 expected as the day rolls on. A fresh west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets, adding a touch of dynamism to the serene afternoon, its gusts brushing against buildings and inviting a languid stroll. While the sunshine brightens the immediate view, the subtle presence of a marine layer may cast soft shadows along the coastline, hinting at the familiar interplay of fog that lingers just beyond the bay.

As evening unfolds, a more temperate ambiance settles over the city, with a low around 57 degrees promising comfort as the daylight wanes. A light wrap or a comfortable sweater would suffice against the cool air that can sneak up unexpectedly. Considering the time of day, it would be delightful to wander to one of the nearby waterfront parks, perhaps to enjoy the gentle sway of the tides as night approaches, or to savor a quiet moment at an outdoor café while watching the world go by, absorbing the city's unique blend of life and light.
